welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rotselaar, Belgium! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks and lakes, as well as its friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that Rotselaar has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal of Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
